title: Adv Database Systems
description: Study of advanced topics in implementing a database system, including the query optimizer, concurrency control and recovery protocols. Includes a project component.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and CS 4400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
